title: Missing Loading Screen Border
body: I received a silver loading screen border at the end of Season 7 (in Nov), but now that Season 8 has started, my border has disappeared.  I see other summoners still have their borders.  I've completed my placements and ranked up a division but that didn't solve anything.  Where has my border gone?

replies.body:
It looks like you do have the Silver 3 Ranked Flex Border! Keep in mind they only show up in specific queues!

RANKED BORDERS
Here is a list of what borders show for what queue after rewards are distributed!
Normal SR: Shows highest of Solo/Duo or Flex
Normal TT: Shows TT Flex reward
RGM/ARAM/Custom: Shows highest of any reward
Co-op vs. AI Summonerâ€™s Rift - Shows highest of Solo/Duo or Flex reward
Co-op vs. AI Twisted Treeline - Shows TT Flex reward
Ranked Solo/Duo: Shows Solo/Duo reward
Ranked Flex SR/Flex TT: Shows Flex reward, depending on SR or TT

Did you receive any punishments that may have disqualified you from ranked rewards? If not, you might want to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if they can check it out for you.
No I did not.  I'll do that, thanks.
